Headline: #29 State, #62 Archer and #146 Inner Drive/ Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near State/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 29 State, 62 Archer and 146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express buses are temp. rerouted near State/Roosevelt, due to police activity near State/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#29 State, #62 Archer and #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted near State/Roosevelt, due to police activity near State/Roosevelt.

Northbound #29 State and #62 Archer buses will operate via State, Roosevelt, Michigan, 9th, State and over regular route.

Northbound #146 inner Drive/Michigan Express buses will operate via Roosevelt, Michigan, 9th, State and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
